Project
Kick-Ass Programmers





Teaching youth in developing countries professional software development


Skills training,
not job creation.



Software development jobs are plenty. Skills are not.





"Give a man a fish and you can feed him for a day.
Teach him how to code and you feed him for a lifetime."

Starting with Somaliland




A country of almost 4 million with youth unemployment at 70%




Watch the videos that shows the journey that started it all

The project is highly focused

Sustainability is a target


realized as graduates becomes teachers
